MatchingRule.name: MatchingRule
MatchingRule.description: Setup object specifying a MatchingRule to use with DuplicateJob instances that share a DuplicateJobDefinition. Available in Tooling API version 42.0 and later.

BooleanFilter.description: Boolean logic between conditions for the MatchingRule.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name for the MatchingRule.

Language.description: The language in the userâ€™s personal settings.

ManageableState.description: Indicates the manageable state of the specified component that is contained in a package: beta deleted deprecated deprecatedEditable installed installedEditable released unmanaged

MatchEngine.description: This field can contain one value: the match engine used by the matching rule. Valid values are ExactMatchEngine and FuzzyMatchEngine. Default value is ExactMatchEngine.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix associated with this object.

RuleStatus.description: The status of the MatchingRule. Valid values are Active or Inactive.

SobjectSubtype.description: The object subtype. Valid values are Person Account or None.

SobjectType.description: The object type:Account, Contact, or Lead.
